title: BC families access local farm produce

tasks.task: Attend a farmers market event in Surrey.
subtasks: Travel to Surrey Rec Centre, North Surrey.
Participate in a partnership event between government, ministry, and farmers market association.
Promote access to BC-grown produce for families and seniors.
Distribute coupon books for low-income families, pregnant women, and seniors.
Facilitate connections between farmers, customers, and the community.
Promote healthy living and nutrition through the initiative.

tasks.task: Organize a program to support community members.
subtasks: Coordinate partnerships with government and local organizations.
Develop coupon books for eligible recipients.
Expand programReach to additional communities (e.g., 21 communities this year).
Secure funding (e.g., $2 million) to grow the program.
Enhance program growth in subsequent years.
Advocate for healthy eating and support local agriculture.
